strategy: Fir Lirithion armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Titans, Wraithknights and the Avatar have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on Eldar Titans and Eldar Knights.

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

sections.name: Fir Lirithion Scout Titans
sections.description: Up to two Scout Titan formations for each Battle Titan

formations.name: Revenant Titan
extraUnits: Give the formation the 'Independent Twins' special rule: 50 points

sections.name: Fir Lirithion Troupes
sections.description: Up to three Troupes for each Battle or Scout Titan formation.

formations.name: Engines of Vaul
formations.units: One Engine of Vaul chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent
extraUnits: Add up to two additional Engines of Vaul for 200 points each

formations.name: Spirit Guard Wraithhost
extraUnits: Add four Wave Serpents: 150 points (may only be taken if the entire formation can fit inside)

sections.name: Craftworld Navy
sections.description: Up to a fourth of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: Fir Lirithion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: 0-1 Bonesinger
items.description: Add one Bonesinger to the formation

items.name: Wraithlord
items.description: Add up to three Eldar Wraithlords
